bibl.title: Two Wall Inscriptions from the Faras Cathedral with Lists of People and Goods.
Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.note: 1. List of people and goods (excavation no. L 49a.3 = DBMNT [Database of Medieval Nubian Texts] 2927). 11th/12th century. - 2. List of people and goods (excavation no. B 120a.3 = DBMNT 2928). 11th/12th century.
bibl.seg: Adam Łajtar & Grzegorz Ochała, Two Wall Inscriptions from the Faras Cathedral with Lists of People and Goods.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 73-102, 2 figg.

1. List of people and goods (excavation no. L 49a.3 = DBMNT [Database of Medieval Nubian Texts] 2927). 11th/12th century. - 2. List of people and goods (excavation no. B 120a.3 = DBMNT 2928). 11th/12th century.
